Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring the department of citywide administrative services to donate surplus city-owned computers, computer software, and computer equipment to public and private institutions for secular educational use and to not-for-profit institutions for use by individuals with disabilities, senior citizens, or low income individuals
